semantic_identifier: [GOLD-181]: Surface segment source-of-truth and mismatch warnings in impact reporting UI
title: Surface segment source-of-truth and mismatch warnings in impact reporting UI

sections.text: Update Issue_Tracker impact-reporting responses and UI components to display the canonical segment identifier/name and the system used as the source of truth (per GOLD-180). When a segment is unmapped or flagged as unknown/mismatched by the canonicalization layer, show a clear warning state and prevent blending totals across conflicting definitions. Add a lightweight tooltip/label linking to the segment mapping entry to aid triage and reduce confusion in segment-based revenue/customer impact views.
